snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. On January 31, 2016, peacefully, surrounded by family. Magnificent and beautiful, Gail's time came too soon. Her kindness, beauty, graciousness, wit, elegance, and creativity will shine on. Beloved wife of Richard H. M. Maidman, ex-wife of Stephen D. Haymes. Nurturing mother of Evan A. Haymes (Regina) and Starr H. Kempin (Jacques). Kind stepmother of Patrick (Jacqueline, departed) Maidman, Mitchel (Arlene) Maidman and Dagny (Molly) Maidman. Loving Momma Gail of Esme, Theodore Haymes and Sterling Kempin. Loving Step- Momma Gail to Allison, Beatrice, Jonathan, Harrison, Julia, Ezra, Sage and Cassidy Maidman. Celebration Service to be held Wednesday, April 6, 11am, at Temple Emanu-El, Fifth Avenue at 65th Street (for information: (212)755-1295) Donations may be made to: The Gail Ann Lowe Maidman Scholarship Fund at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts c/o Susan Zech, President, 120 Madison Avenue, New York City, NY 10016, to The Gail Ann Lowe Maidman Fund at the Jewish Communal Fund, 575 Madison Ave., New York, NY 10022 or as you choose. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. On January 31, 2016, peacefully, surrounded by family. Magnificent and beautiful, Gail's time came too soon. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE
